20101228070711.000|20101228070713.000|CC1|SO HOW IS IT THAT YOU HAVE BEEN

20101228070823.000|20101228070825.000|CC1|DO YOU TAKE ANY OF THIS

20101228070827.000|20101228070830.000|CC1|STAYING INSECURE, DO YOU TAKE IT

20101228070830.000|20101228070832.000|CC1|>> I WORRY ABOUT WHAT HAPPENS TO
20101228070832.000|20101228070833.000|CC1|OUR COUNTRY.                    
20101228070833.000|20101228070835.000|CC1|I DO FEEL THERE ARE MILLIONS OF 
20101228070835.000|20101228070836.000|CC1|PEOPLE UNEMPLOYED AROUND THE    
20101228070836.000|20101228070838.000|CC1|WORLD AND WE COULD DO SOMETHING

20101228071700.000|20101228071702.000|CC1|GIVING PEOPLE THE CHANCE TO     
20101228071702.000|20101228071704.000|CC1|REALIZE THE POTENTIAL.          
20101228071704.000|20101228071706.000|CC1|TAVIS: I ASSUME, THOUGH, I TAKE 
20101228071706.000|20101228071707.000|CC1|IT THAT YOU WOULD AGREE THERE IS
20101228071707.000|20101228071710.000|CC1|NO CRUCIAL DISTINCTION TO BE    
20101228071710.000|20101228071711.000|CC1|MADE BETWEEN PESSIMISM, WHICH

20101228071713.000|20101228071716.000|CC1|THE AMERICAN PEOPLE OR BRITISH
